description: Provides instructions on how to obtain the Service Account JSON credentials file required for authentication with Google Cloud services.
steps: 1. Go to the Google Cloud Console (https://console.cloud.google.com/).
2. Click the ⚙️ Project Settings (top left, near 'Project Overview').
3. Go to the Service accounts tab.
4. Under Firebase Admin SDK, click Generate new private key.
6. A JSON file will download to your computer. This is the service account key.
